gameview.sView

Class SPlayerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameview.sView.SPlayerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SPlayerPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel to configure a specific player. You can set the player name, type(police or thief), figure color, figure count. When the next Button of the PlayerSettingPanel is pressed by the every information user will be sent in an event.
    Author:
    Raphael A.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • SPlayerPanel

        public SPlayerPanel(SPlayerSettingPanel sPSPanel,
            int colorIndex,
            int type,
            int id,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> language)
        The constructor. When a new SPlayerPanel is created the init() method is called.
        Parameters:
        sPSPanel - SPlayer settings panel
        colorIndex - index of color
        type - player type
        id - player id
        language - map with language data
